Package com.hotel.UI

Class ReservationUI

java.lang.Object
com.hotel.UI.ReservationUI
public class ReservationUI extends Object
Represents the class of ReservationUI, which prints the UI for Reservation-related operations
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createRes()
    This method prints the UI for the creation of a reservation then obtains the relevant inputs and creates the reservation
    void
    printAllRes()
    This method prints the all details of all reservations
    void
    printRese()
    This method prints the UI for the printing of a reservation's details then obtains the relevant inputs and prints the details
    void
    removeRes()
    This method prints the UI for the removal of a reservation then obtains the relevant inputs and removes the reservation
    void
    toExpireRes()
    This method expire reservations on todays date
    void
    updateRes()
    This method prints the UI for the updating of a reservation then obtains the relevant inputs and updates the reservation
    void
    walkIn()
    This method prints the UI for the creation of a walk-in reservation then obtains the relevant inputs and creates the reservation and updates the room
